name: Change, process, outcomes, and trends
description: Patterns describing how states change over time and how outcomes are reached (including N2/N1 'after much...').

entries.meaning: come to be able to / reach a new state or habit over time
entries.example_jp: 毎日練習して、日本語が話せるようになりました。
entries.example_en: By practicing every day, I became able to speak Japanese.

entries.meaning: change or movement toward the speaker / something has started or continued up to now
entries.example_jp: だんだん寒くなってきました。

entries.meaning: change or movement away from the speaker / continue into the future
entries.example_jp: これからも日本語を勉強していきます。
entries.example_en: I will continue studying Japanese from now on.

entries.meaning: try to / make an effort to
entries.example_jp: 毎日日本語を話すようにしています。
entries.example_en: I try to speak Japanese every day.

entries.meaning: it has been decided that / end up doing
entries.example_jp: 来月引っ越すことになりました。
entries.example_en: It has been decided that I will move next month.

entries.meaning: become; come to be (となる more formal)
entries.example_jp: 大人になると、時間が早く感じる。
entries.example_en: When you become an adult, time feels faster.

entries.meaning: it turns out that; end up (contextual)
entries.example_jp: 探したが、見つからないようだ。
entries.example_en: I searched, but it seems I can't find it (it turns out).

entries.meaning: after a long period; in the end (often negative)
entries.example_jp: 迷ったあげく、買わなかった。
entries.example_en: After much hesitation, I didn't buy it.

entries.meaning: after; at the end of (often effort)
entries.example_jp: 話し合いの末、解決した。
努力した結果、合格できた。
entries.example_en: As a result of effort, I passed.

entries.example_jp: ちょうど出かけるところに電話が来た。
entries.example_en: Right when I was about to go out, a call came.

entries.example_jp: 年を取るにつれて体力が落ちる。
entries.example_en: As you get older, your stamina declines.

entries.example_jp: 状況が悪化するにしたがって、対策が必要だ。
entries.example_en: As the situation worsens, measures are needed.

entries.meaning: along with; as a result of
entries.example_jp: 値上げにともない、サービスが変わった。
entries.example_en: Along with the price increase, the service changed.

entries.example_jp: 事故で計画の変更を余儀なくされた。
entries.example_en: We were forced to change plans due to the accident.

entries.example_jp: 議論の末、合意に至った。
entries.example_en: After discussion, we reached an agreement.
